verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me, even to me <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that which <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me at the <S%H8462>first.<s%>

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2377>vision;<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> that I was at <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> in the <S%H1002>palace,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H4082>province<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam;<s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2377>vision,<s%> and I was by the <S%H180>river<s%> of <S%H195>Ulai.<s%>

Then I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H180>river<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> which had two <S%H7161>horns:<s%> and the two <S%H7161>horns<s%> were <S%H1364>high;<s%> but <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H1364>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H8145>other,<s%> and the <S%H1364>higher<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H314>last.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H5055>pushing<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H5045>southward;<s%> so that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> might <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H369>neither<s%> was there any that could <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but he <S%H6213>did<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will,<s%> and <S%H1431>became<s%> <S%H1431>great.<s%>

And as I was <S%H995>considering,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> an he <S%H5795>goat<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H4628>west<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> not the <S%H776>ground:<s%> and the <S%H6842>goat<s%> had a <S%H2380>notable<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H352>ram<s%> that had two <S%H7161>horns,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H180>river,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> to him in the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of his <S%H3581>power.<s%>

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H5060>come<s%> <S%H681>close<s%> to the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and he was moved with <S%H4843>choler<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7161>horns:<s%> and there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> in the <S%H352>ram<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, but he <S%H7993>cast<s%> him down to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H7429>stamped<s%> on him: and there was <S%H3808>none<s%> that could <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Therefore the he <S%H6842>goat<s%> waxed <S%H5704>very<s%> <S%H3960><s%> <S%H1431>great:<s%> and when he was <S%H6105>strong,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> was <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and for it <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2380>notable<s%> ones toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And out of <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H4704>little<s%> <S%H7161>horn,<s%> which waxed <S%H3499>exceeding<s%> <S%H1431>great,<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6643>pleasant<s%> land.

And it waxed <S%H1431>great,<s%> even to the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and it <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> some of the <S%H6635>host<s%> and of the <S%H3556>stars<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H7429>stamped<s%> on them.

Yes, he <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself even to the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H6635>host,<s%> and by him the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice was <S%H7311>taken<s%> <S%H7311>away,<s%> and the <S%H4349>place<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> was <S%H7993>cast<s%> down.

And an <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice by reason of <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and it <S%H7993>cast<s%> down the <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and it <S%H6213>practiced,<s%> and <S%H6743>prospered.<s%>

Then I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6918>saint<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6918>saint<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to that <S%H6422>certain<s%> saint which <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall be the <S%H2377>vision<s%> concerning the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice, and the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H8074>desolation,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> both the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H6635>host<s%> to be <S%H4823>trodden<s%> under <S%H4823>foot?<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, To two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6153>days;<s%> <S%H1242><s%> then shall the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> be <S%H6663>cleansed.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when I, even I <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> and <S%H1245>sought<s%> for the <S%H998>meaning,<s%> then, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H1397>man.<s%>

And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the banks of <S%H195>Ulai,<s%> which <S%H7121>called,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1403>Gabriel,<s%> make <S%H1975>this<s%> man to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>

So he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> where I <S%H5977>stood:<s%> and when he <S%H935>came,<s%> I was <S%H1204>afraid,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face:<s%> but he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H995>Understand,<s%> O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man:<s%> for at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>

Now as he was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me, I was in a <S%H7290>deep<s%> <S%H7290>sleep<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground:<s%> but he <S%H5060>touched<s%> me, and <S%H5975>set<s%> me <S%H5977>upright.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will make you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall be in the <S%H319>last<s%> end of the <S%H2195>indignation:<s%> for at the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be.
The <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1167>having<s%> two <S%H7161>horns<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media<s%> and <S%H6539>Persia.<s%>

And the <S%H8163>rough<s%> <S%H6842>goat<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3120>Grecia:<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> that is <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> is the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Now that being <S%H7665>broken,<s%> whereas <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> up for it, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4438>kingdoms<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up out of the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> but not in his <S%H3581>power.<s%>

And in the <S%H319>latter<s%> time of their <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> when the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> are come to the <S%H8552>full,<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H2420>dark<s%> <S%H2420>sentences,<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up.

And his <S%H3581>power<s%> shall be <S%H6105>mighty,<s%> but not by his own <S%H3581>power:<s%> and he shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H6381>wonderfully,<s%> and shall <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> and <S%H6213>practice,<s%> and shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6099>mighty<s%> and the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H5921>through<s%> his <S%H7922>policy<s%> also he shall cause <S%H4820>craft<s%> to <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he shall <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and by <S%H7962>peace<s%> shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H7227>many:<s%> he shall also <S%H5975>stand<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H8269>Prince<s%> of <S%H8269>princes;<s%> but he shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And the <S%H4758>vision<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H560>told<s%> is <S%H571>true:<s%> why <S%H5640>shut<s%> you up the <S%H2377>vision;<s%> for it shall be for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H1961>fainted,<s%> and was <S%H2470>sick<s%> certain <S%H3117>days;<s%> afterward I <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4399>business;<s%> and I was <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H4758>vision,<s%> but <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H995>understood<s%> it.
